About This Website

This website allows users to manage accounts, albums, and view the latest announcements.

We use SQL Server for data management and demonstrate basic CRUD operations with the following SQL syntaxes:

  • Account Management: INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE
  • Album Management: INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE
  • Announcements: INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE
